LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: Tokiwa and Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2BE
STRING: They were both equally talented in my eyes, and they were now joining hands.

LABEL: 0x308
STRING: ――We hadn't lost yet.

LABEL: 0x334
STRING: The pain of failure was great because we gave our all to the possibilities that lay before us, one by one.

LABEL: 0x390
STRING: Our regrets might be great in number.

LABEL: 0x3BC
STRING: But even if our current situation didn't change, it was still an important step that we advanced from one thought to the next.

LABEL: 0x475
STRING: Each and every failure was carved into our minds as we walked toward our goal.

LABEL: 0x4B7
STRING: The goal of being saved.

LABEL: 0x4E9
STRING: Our every step wouldn't leave footprints toward the future.

LABEL: 0x527
STRING: Traits such as having five eyes and seven pairs of spines arose at one time, but disappeared without being passed on to future generations.

LABEL: 0x5EC
STRING: However, that didn't mean that their existence was unnecessary.

LABEL: 0x622
STRING: By being cut down, by being cut off from the numerous options, Hamlet was written, and the clock was invented.

LABEL: 0x690
STRING: We couldn't stay still.

LABEL: 0x6BA
STRING: We had to connect our hope once more.

LABEL: 0x6DE
STRING: To the surface――

LABEL: 0x7B4
STRING: 「The failure with the messenger buoy was caused by its wire being severed.」

LABEL: 0x806
STRING: 「――Why was it cut?」

LABEL: 0x83C
STRING: 「I have a theory, but I need to confirm it.」

LABEL: 0xB79
STRING: Once again, we gathered inside the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0xB9F
STRING: On the desk was the wire we had retrieved from the laboratory.

LABEL: 0xBD9
STRING: The tip, which should have been attached to the buoy, had been pitifully severed.

LABEL: 0xC1F
STRING: About two-thirds of the cut had been done cleanly, like a cut by a blade.

LABEL: 0xC7C
STRING: It was so clean that it felt like something man-made―did it get caught in a propeller or something?

LABEL: 0xCD4
STRING: But on the other hand...

LABEL: 0xCF0
STRING: About a third of the cross-section was crushed, ground, and severed in an ugly manner.

LABEL: 0xD43
STRING: It looked wild. It was as if someone, or something, had bitten it off――

LABEL: 0xDAA
STRING: 「――Light.」

LABEL: 0xDC9
STRING: Reiri nodded with conviction.

LABEL: 0xE5D
STRING: 「When I say light, I don't mean <COOS>. I'm talking about a more artificial light...」

LABEL: 0xEA3
STRING: 「That messenger buoy emits light when it rises.」

LABEL: 0xEE5
STRING: 「It's in order to make it easier to find in the dark sea.」

LABEL: 0xF29
STRING: 「A shining buoy like that is the perfect target. That's probably why it was attacked.」

LABEL: 0x104E
STRING: 「Attacked by what?」

LABEL: 0x1083
STRING: 「Cthulhu, leviathan, kraken, sea serpent...」

LABEL: 0x1136
STRING: 「...There are many lifeforms lurking in this vast sea that we know nothing about.」

LABEL: 0x118D
STRING: She didn't allude to the giant organisms transformed by <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x11D5
STRING: ...Giving fragmented information like that to Touri, who understood little of it, would only lead to more confusion...

LABEL: 0x123B
STRING: She must be worried about her sister in her own way.

LABEL: 0x12DD
STRING: 「Come to think of it, the exploration unit was destroyed after the accident as well!」

LABEL: 0x1323
STRING: 「Was that also...?」

LABEL: 0x1358
STRING: 「Yes, it would make sense.」

LABEL: 0x138D
STRING: I wondered if it was a giant fish, or some creature with a completely different appearance.

LABEL: 0x1407
STRING: Whatever it was, it was definitely out there.

LABEL: 0x1431
STRING: In this sea where the <SHEEP III> lay, just like us.

LABEL: 0x146E
STRING: Escaping from this sea, which had become a magical world where things of unknown shapes and intentions were stirring――

LABEL: 0x14BE
STRING: I could understand why Reiri wanted to give up.

LABEL: 0x15B7
STRING: 「I see. But then, if we try again, we might succeed.」

LABEL: 0x1607
STRING: 「And if that doesn't work, we can try yet again... We'll need a buoy that doesn't glow, of course.」

LABEL: 0x1661
STRING: 「If we try enough times, we're bound to succeed.」

LABEL: 0x16A8
STRING: A solution through infinite trials.

LABEL: 0x16CE
STRING: Like Turing, you couldn't use a tape with infinite length.

LABEL: 0x1728
STRING: 「Unfortunately... that was our only buoy.」

LABEL: 0x17C0
STRING: 「It doesn't have to be a buoy. As long as it floats, anything's fine.」

LABEL: 0x180D
STRING: 「Isn't there something like that in the warehouse?」

LABEL: 0x18C9
STRING: 「...As I mentioned earlier, in order to reach the surface from here, it would have to be able to withstand water pressure at a depth of 700 meters.」

LABEL: 0x193D
STRING: 「On top of that, there aren't many things that have stable buoyancy.」

LABEL: 0x1991
STRING: 「It's hard to imagine something like that just lying around in the warehouse.」

LABEL: 0x1A47
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x1A68
STRING: There weren't many things that were able to withstand the necessary water pressure and which could float on top of that.

LABEL: 0x1AD0
STRING: They would have to be something made solely for that purpose, like the messenger buoys.

LABEL: 0x1B1E
STRING: Empty bottles of Dividing Dry, for example, would be compressed to the size of your palm the moment you put them out in the water.

LABEL: 0x1B94
STRING: The models lined up in marine museums weren't just funny exaggerations.

LABEL: 0x1C1C
STRING: Those two requirements, pressure resistance and buoyancy, were too strict.

LABEL: 0x1C53
STRING: Should we throw away that line of thinking after all――

LABEL: 0x1CF3
STRING: 「There is one thing.」

LABEL: 0x1D15
STRING: 「Something with both pressure resistance and buoyancy.」

LABEL: 0x1DA0
STRING: 「――The pressure-resistant diving suits.」

LABEL: 0x1DC7
STRING: 「It's true that they can withstand water pressure, but they don't have enough buoyancy.」

LABEL: 0x1E18
STRING: 「It's intentionally suppressing its buoyancy.」

LABEL: 0x1E4E
STRING: 「You wouldn't be able to do stable underwater work if you floated around more than you needed to, right?」

LABEL: 0x1EB5
STRING: 「Intentionally...?」

LABEL: 0x1F43
STRING: 「All you have to do is remove all the weights inside.」

LABEL: 0x1F77
STRING: 「That would give us a few dozen kilos worth of buoyancy, wouldn't it?」

LABEL: 0x1FD0
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x1FEF
STRING: Touri's eyes lit up.

LABEL: 0x200F
STRING: However, there were no signs of joy on Reiri's face.

LABEL: 0x205B
STRING: Yukari and Hiragino's expressions were dark as well... They were still pensive.

LABEL: 0x216C
STRING: 「It might be possible, but...」

LABEL: 0x21A0
STRING: 「The risk of failure is too great.」

LABEL: 0x21E1
STRING: 「There's a good chance that it'll fail, and if it does, we'll lose our diving suit――」

LABEL: 0x22AD
STRING: 「...Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x22D8
STRING: Both of them were calm.

LABEL: 0x22F6
STRING: Even Reiri, who came up with the idea, didn't seem to see it as anything more than a possibility.

LABEL: 0x234A
STRING: However, it would be a shame to dismiss it so easily.

LABEL: 0x237C
STRING: The original idea was to physically reach out to the surface since we couldn't contact them through our communication devices.

LABEL: 0x2428
STRING: ――It felt like all we needed was one more step.

LABEL: 0x2460
STRING: But I couldn't think of anything.

LABEL: 0x24A2
STRING: Our discussion turned to silence.

LABEL: 0x24CC
STRING: Myriad thoughts were swirling over the wire on the desk.

LABEL: 0x25AC
STRING: ――Without intending to, I looked out the window and saw the pitch-black sea.

LABEL: 0x25F0
STRING: That scenery, still as dark as ever, looked like the world of the night.

LABEL: 0x262E
STRING: The loneliness of being shipwrecked remained the same.

LABEL: 0x2668
STRING: Both the Mary Celeste and the <SHEEP III> were struggling in this deep darkness.

LABEL: 0x26C1
STRING: Or, were unable to struggle.

LABEL: 0x26F8
STRING: 「...I wonder what people did in the past.」

LABEL: 0x27CF
STRING: Touri raised her voice abruptly.

LABEL: 0x27ED
STRING: When I looked, I saw that she was also staring out the dark window.

LABEL: 0x28F4
STRING: 「You know what they say, "Learn from the wisdom of your predecessors."」

LABEL: 0x2949
STRING: 「"The fool learns from experience, and the wise learn from history."」

LABEL: 0x29E2
STRING: 「Let me tell you something nice, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x2A10
STRING: 「In the old days, if you sank to a depth of 700 meters, you'd be long dead.」

LABEL: 0x2AB6
STRING: 「I-I know that, but that's not what I meant!」

LABEL: 0x2B64
STRING: 「I know. I'm kidding.」

LABEL: 0x2C1B
STRING: ...People of the past.

LABEL: 0x2C39
STRING: I wondered if the people in distress back then had harbored these thoughts as well.

LABEL: 0x2C7B
STRING: What were they thinking in the middle of the sea, where they'd lost their coordinates, where neither the nautical chart nor the compass would be of any use?

LABEL: 0x2CD9
STRING: The solitude in that vast world――

LABEL: 0x2E5A
STRING: 「...On the surface, there would've been stars.」

LABEL: 0x2E8A
STRING: 「Relying on the stars to sail. That's how old ships always crossed the sea.」

LABEL: 0x2F46
STRING: 「Oh, even if there were stars here, that wouldn't change the fact that the <SHEEP III> can't move, would it?」

LABEL: 0x2F9B
STRING: 「We can only pray.」

LABEL: 0x2FBB
STRING: 「――That someone finds us soon.」

LABEL: 0x2FF8
STRING: Tokiwa put her hands in front of her chest.

LABEL: 0x3022
STRING: Relying on the stars, on the lights that were up high, far away, and unreachable.

LABEL: 0x305C
STRING: It was almost like a prayer to God.

LABEL: 0x3095
STRING: 「Shall we pray too?」

LABEL: 0x3131
STRING: 「I'll pass. I'm not in the habit of doing meaningless things.」

LABEL: 0x31DB
STRING: 「That's too bad.」

LABEL: 0x3232
STRING: Saying that, Tokiwa meditated alone while facing the wide window.

LABEL: 0x3274
STRING: She was wearing a tidy kimono that matched her hair.

LABEL: 0x32A6
STRING: The way she quietly closed her eyes, clasped her hands together, and prayed was a very elegant sight.

LABEL: 0x32EA
STRING: But... to think that Tokiwa believed in God.

LABEL: 0x3322
STRING: I'd heard that there were a lot of religious people in the scientific community, and she seemed to be one of them.

LABEL: 0x33EB
STRING: 「Still, it's beautiful...」

LABEL: 0x3418
STRING: Touri, who had been staring blankly out the window, whispered.

LABEL: 0x344A
STRING: In the overwhelming darkness outside the pitch-black window, there was a glimmer of light.

LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: Marine snow.

LABEL: 0x34B6
STRING: Occasionally glowing dead bacteria.

LABEL: 0x34E2
STRING: Death, falling slowly and silently, was proof that life that existed there in the lonely black sky.

LABEL: 0x354B
STRING: 「...Snow in the middle of summer.」

LABEL: 0x3584
STRING: She must have murmured it without any intention.

LABEL: 0x35B4
STRING: Still, "midsummer snow"――

LABEL: 0x35DA
STRING: Those words sounded like――

LABEL: 0x35FE
STRING: 「Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x3629
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x373C
STRING: Yukari's suspicious voice brought me back to my senses.

LABEL: 0x3762
STRING: I shook my head to drive away my sudden muttering.

LABEL: 0x37A2
STRING: 「...It's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x37CC
STRING: 「I just remembered something strange.」

LABEL: 0x382A
STRING: She gave an ambiguous reply, whether convinced or not.

LABEL: 0x385A
STRING: I thought about following up with something seeing the look of concern on her face

LABEL: 0x38B4
STRING: after I suddenly mentioned my sister.

LABEL: 0x3933
STRING: 「What's that!?」

LABEL: 0x3956
STRING: Touri let out a high-pitched voice as she stared out the window absentmindedly.

LABEL: 0x3994
STRING: All eyes followed where she was pointing her finger.

LABEL: 0x39D0
STRING: Could it be that a grotesque monster had appeared...?

LABEL: 0x3A68
STRING: However, what my eyes landed upon was an unexpected object.

LABEL: 0x3AA8
STRING: Floating and rolling in the sea not far outside the <SHEEP III>...

LABEL: 0x3AE7
STRING: ...Was a yellow, rod-shaped object.

LABEL: 0x3BB6
STRING: 「What is that?」

LABEL: 0x3C46
STRING: 「Leave this to me.」

LABEL: 0x3C64
STRING: 「I'll catch it.」

LABEL: 0x3C8F
STRING: Tokiwa stood in front of the control panel.

LABEL: 0x3CDB
STRING: Without receiving instructions from anyone, she piloted the arm with familiar motions and captured her target.

LABEL: 0x3D2D
STRING: Something yellow in the shape of a rod.

LABEL: 0x3D4D
STRING: It wasn't a living thing by any stretch of the imagination.

LABEL: 0x3D9F
STRING: It was clearly man-made.

LABEL: 0x3E8C
STRING: 「What is this?」

LABEL: 0x3EBB
STRING: 「It's an Argo float.」

LABEL: 0x3EE6
STRING: 「An Argo float?」

LABEL: 0x3F08
STRING: I wasn't sure if that sounded familiar or not...

LABEL: 0x4019
STRING: 「Ah! I remember!」

LABEL: 0x4044
STRING: 「Yukari-san explained it to me the day before yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x4085
STRING: Huh.

LABEL: 0x4123
STRING: The day before yesterday... So, on the observation deck?

LABEL: 0x42B2
STRING: 「How do you measure the speed at which water moves in the sea?」

LABEL: 0x42F6
STRING: 「To tell you the truth, the same system is used here to measure the temperature of the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x43F2
STRING: 「An Argo float.」

LABEL: 0x44BB
STRING: 「Aah..」

LABEL: 0x44D7
STRING: I thought I remembered something like that happening...

LABEL: 0x4501
STRING: Yukari seemed to sense that I wasn't quite on the mark and shrugged her shoulders.

LABEL: 0x45BB
STRING: 「Shall we talk about the Argo Project again?」

LABEL: 0x45FB
STRING: 「It's an international scientific project to build a system to monitor and understand the status of the global oceans in real time.」

LABEL: 0x4677
STRING: 「The Argo float, a key component of this system, automatically floats between the seafloor and the surface.」

LABEL: 0x46D1
STRING: 「It's an instrument meant for measuring water temperature, salinity――」

LABEL: 0x470C
STRING: 「――Wait just a second.」

LABEL: 0x472E
STRING: I stopped Yukari in the middle of her explanation.

LABEL: 0x4768
STRING: What did she just say?

LABEL: 0x479D
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x47C2
STRING: 「An Argo float...」

LABEL: 0x47E6
STRING: As it rose and fell from the deep sea to the surface, it continued to observe the state of the surrounding waters and transmitted data...

LABEL: 0x4846
STRING: An Argo float would have to be buoyant and pressure resistant――

LABEL: 0x4888
STRING: Tokiwa and Reiri looked at each other and nodded.

LABEL: 0x48B8
STRING: 「If we use this, we can send another message to the surface!」

LABEL: 0x4BC0
STRING: 「There's something I need to think about.」

LABEL: 0x4BF1
STRING: Leaving Yukari alone in the wheelhouse, we headed for the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x4CDD
STRING: The Argo float that Tokiwa had captured and recovered was brought inside the ship there.

LABEL: 0x4D29
STRING: It looked like a yellow rod, but when I looked at it again under the room light, it was bigger than I had imagined.

LABEL: 0x4D91
STRING: It was almost twenty centimeters in diameter. A cylindrical object with a pointed tip, like a giant pencil or syringe.

LABEL: 0x4DF3
STRING: Its cylindrical body, nearly one meter long, was yellow, and sensors and transmitters could be seen at the end of it.

LABEL: 0x4E4B
STRING: 「Sweet...!」

LABEL: 0x4E69
STRING: Like the messenger buoy earlier, it was fully pressure and water resistant, and capable of surfacing.

LABEL: 0x4ECB
STRING: Not only were there no problems, but there was no better device than this for our needs, was there?

LABEL: 0x4F81
STRING: 「All right! Let's hurry up and write a message!」

LABEL: 0x4FC4
STRING: 「Write?」

LABEL: 0x5048
STRING: 「Of course! Let's write our coordinates or an SOS or something on this thing.」

LABEL: 0x5099
STRING: 「Also... it would be better for the rescuers if we write down as much information as we can, like a parcel!」

LABEL: 0x510C
STRING: 「...Won't the writing just disappear?」

LABEL: 0x51C2
STRING: 「I guess...」

LABEL: 0x51ED
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x520C
STRING: Reiri sighed loudly for dramatic effect.

LABEL: 0x5244
STRING: She curled her fingers around her long, unkempt hair in disgust.

LABEL: 0x5359
STRING: 「That's extremely cliched and analog.」

LABEL: 0x53EF
STRING: 「But it's better than nothing, right?」

LABEL: 0x548B
STRING: 「I'm not saying we shouldn't do it, but there has to be a better way.」

LABEL: 0x54CD
STRING: 「Let's see... Why don't we send back a memory device or something?」

LABEL: 0x5576
STRING: 「It's our last chance, anyway.」

LABEL: 0x559E
STRING: 「We should send as much information as we can.」

LABEL: 0x55E1
STRING: It was true that there was more information that could be sent by attaching an entire data file than with a physical message that might disappear.

LABEL: 0x5657
STRING: What happened on this ship, our situation――

LABEL: 0x568D
STRING: I didn't think we'd be able to fully convey everything, but we should still try our best.

LABEL: 0x56D1
STRING: 「What kind of information are we supposed to send?」

LABEL: 0x570C
STRING: 「Who knows. Why don't you just pull the appropriate stuff off the main PC in the wheelhouse?」

LABEL: 0x5773
STRING: 「In that case, I have an idea.」

LABEL: 0x57DE
STRING: At that moment, Yukari arrived from the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x5814
STRING: She quickly walked over to the Argo float.

LABEL: 0x58BE
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x58DC
STRING: 「There's a good chance this'll make it to the surface without any issues.」

LABEL: 0x592D
STRING: She spoke while calmly inspecting the float.

LABEL: 0x595D
STRING: Perhaps it was due to the fresh memory of our earlier failure, but there was no sign of relief on her reluctant face.

LABEL: 0x59A9
STRING: 「So? What's this idea you have?」

LABEL: 0x5A45
STRING: 「Ah, it's this.」

LABEL: 0x5A84
STRING: Yukari took something out of her pocket.

LABEL: 0x5AC0
STRING: A small, palm-sized, pitch-black cube.

LABEL: 0x5AF6
STRING: Its profound blackness felt like it was pulling you in just by looking at it,

LABEL: 0x5B3A
STRING: like the fantastical "dark matter" had manifested itself in reality.

LABEL: 0x5B8A
STRING: 「And this is...?」

LABEL: 0x5C14
STRING: 「<Onyx>.」

LABEL: 0x5C36
STRING: 「To put it simply, it's a copy of the data from this ship's black box.」

LABEL: 0x5C82
STRING: 「It contains all the records of this ship up until just now.」

LABEL: 0x5D89
STRING: 「Does that mean that everything that's happened inside the <SHEEP III> was turned into data?」

LABEL: 0x5DEF
STRING: 「That's what's contained in here.」

LABEL: 0x5E2B
STRING: 「If they look at this, the situation we're in will be conveyed to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x5EAD
STRING: 「――They'll definitely come to save us.」

LABEL: 0x5EE8
STRING: Yukari spoke as calmly and composedly as she could.

LABEL: 0x5F1C
STRING: But... a copy of the ship's black box?

LABEL: 0x5F52
STRING: Everything was contained inside that small cube, not even the size of Yukari's palm.

LABEL: 0x6020
STRING: It was... like a joke.

LABEL: 0x6050
STRING: Everything about our fight, our efforts to survive, was recorded inside this <Onyx>.

LABEL: 0x60B4
STRING: There was nothing more to it than that.

LABEL: 0x6186
STRING: Its efficiency made me feel empty.

LABEL: 0x61BC
STRING: I wondered why Yukari didn't seem at all proud despite the existence of such a recording function.

LABEL: 0x621C
STRING: It felt a little strange, but it was a trivial matter.

LABEL: 0x6321
STRING: 「I think replicating the black box like that was designed for situations like this.」

LABEL: 0x638B
STRING: 「If it was, then it must be built to prevent data loss even in the harshest environments.」

LABEL: 0x644A
STRING: 「Surely, it can withstand the water pressure of 700 meters with ease.」

LABEL: 0x6499
STRING: 「Then, it's decided.」

LABEL: 0x64BA
STRING: 「Okay――」

LABEL: 0x650C
STRING: 「Let's get ready right away. Yukari-san, the <Onyx>.」

LABEL: 0x6557
STRING: 「Here.」

LABEL: 0x6572
STRING: We then began the preparations for ejection once again.

LABEL: 0x65A6
STRING: It hadn't even been half a day since we launched the messenger buoy. This would be our second shot――

LABEL: 0x6664
STRING: However, there would be no next time.

LABEL: 0x6688
STRING: Even the discovery of the Argo float was by chance.

LABEL: 0x66C4
STRING: It was hard to assume that such lucky coincidences would continue.

LABEL: 0x66FA
STRING: Reiri had also said that this would be our last chance, and it was probably not an exaggeration.

LABEL: 0x674C
STRING: I carefully tied it to the wire and embedded the <Onyx> in its cylinder.

LABEL: 0x679A
STRING: With this, we'd be able to convey what happened on this ship for certain.

LABEL: 0x67E0
STRING: We performed the rest of the inspections and other tasks with care.

LABEL: 0x6818
STRING: There shouldn't be any problems.

LABEL: 0x683A
STRING: We couldn't let up until the end... but we'd done the best we could.

LABEL: 0x6924
STRING: Now, all that was left was to launch it, and if ROMLES found it――

LABEL: 0x69CC
STRING: 「...Will they really find this?」

LABEL: 0x6A07
STRING: Touri suddenly expressed her anxiety.

LABEL: 0x6A2F
STRING: 「Whether they'll find it or not is up to luck...」

LABEL: 0x6AD9
STRING: 「Yeah. That's true, but that's not what I meant.」

LABEL: 0x6B11
STRING: 「Doesn't an Argo float rise up and down automatically?」

LABEL: 0x6B6C
STRING: 「Yes, it exchanges data via a satellite.」

LABEL: 0x6BAB
STRING: However, Reiri had brought up the possibility that satellites were not usable right now.

LABEL: 0x6C0C
STRING: 「Then, when the Argo float rises up to the surface of the sea...」

LABEL: 0x6C50
STRING: 「No one will realize that it's a message from the <SHEEP III>, right?」

LABEL: 0x6CC4
STRING: That was... true.

LABEL: 0x6CFC
STRING: 「But even if they can't tell at a glance, won't they notice when it's recovered?」

LABEL: 0x6DCC
STRING: 「Argo floats are never recovered directly.」

LABEL: 0x6E6B
STRING: 「Once it's launched, it will exchange its data via satellite, and no human hands will touch it again.」

LABEL: 0x6EE8
STRING: I should have guessed...

LABEL: 0x6F0A
STRING: Then, no one would ever find it.

LABEL: 0x6F40
STRING: No matter how far out to sea it reached, if the message didn't reach anyone beyond that point, what was the point?

LABEL: 0x6FB2
STRING: 「Nice one, Touri... That was a close one...」

LABEL: 0x6FF9
STRING: 「Come on. Pull yourself together, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x7095
STRING: 「I-I was careless. I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x70D0
STRING: Yukari bowed her head in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x70FA
STRING: That was a close call.

LABEL: 0x711C
STRING: A few more steps and we would have squandered the opportunity that we had just gained.

LABEL: 0x7182
STRING: However, with the Argo float, it was perfectly feasible to at least reach the surface without issues.

LABEL: 0x71E4
STRING: One more step, no, half a step.

LABEL: 0x7208
STRING: If only there was a way to deliver the Argo float that had reached the surface to people――

LABEL: 0x7321
STRING: 「How about flashy decorations? You hate those sorts of things, don't you, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x737C
STRING: 「It's not that I hate them. There's a good chance they'll overlook it.」

LABEL: 0x7481
STRING: 「Then why don't we use a powerful light to appeal to them?」

LABEL: 0x74CD
STRING: 「Then it'll be the same as the messenger buoy. It'll be over if something rips it off.」

LABEL: 0x758F
STRING: 「Uhh... Well then...」

LABEL: 0x75BC
STRING: Touri seemed to have run out of ideas already.

LABEL: 0x75EC
STRING: 「Did anyone sneak in their cell phone or something?」

LABEL: 0x76A0
STRING: 「I'm the only one who'd do something like that.」

LABEL: 0x76E9
STRING: Well, that was true.

LABEL: 0x770B
STRING: Reiri had brought those smart glasses with her.

LABEL: 0x773D
STRING: If we sent a cell phone or some other communication device to the surface, it should be detected, right?

LABEL: 0x7821
STRING: 「Unfortunately, I only brought what I needed.」

LABEL: 0x7861
STRING: 「I don't have anything other than those smart glasses, and they don't have any communication capabilities.」

LABEL: 0x78C5
STRING: 「Besides, even if I did, there'd be no signal if the satellite is dead.」

LABEL: 0x7922
STRING: Right――

LABEL: 0x793A
STRING: I could only imagine what the situation on the surface was,

LABEL: 0x797C
STRING: but if chaos akin to the "Fourth Day" was occurring due to a super flare, we couldn't rely on satellite communications to begin with.

LABEL: 0x7A64
STRING: 「...Is there anything we can do?」

LABEL: 0x7A9B
STRING: 「Think...」

LABEL: 0x7AB7
STRING: 「We need to think...」

LABEL: 0x7B5F
STRING: 「In order to think, we need some material.」

LABEL: 0x7B8F
STRING: 「Everyone, let's lay out everything that could be of use, shall we?」

LABEL: 0x7C14
STRING: There was a limit to what you could think of inside your own head.

LABEL: 0x7C46
STRING: Following Tokiwa's suggestion, everyone took out what was in their pockets.

LABEL: 0x7C90
STRING: Yukari took off the wristband she'd used to communicate with POL.

LABEL: 0x7D3D
STRING: 「This only serves as a transceiver within this ship.」

LABEL: 0x7DEA
STRING: 「It wouldn't work outside the ship, and even if it did, the signal would be too weak.」

LABEL: 0x7E43
STRING: There was a bent coin pendant in my pocket.

LABEL: 0x7EDA
STRING: 「That's... useless.」

LABEL: 0x7F76
STRING: 「Take good care of it...」

LABEL: 0x7FA9
STRING: 「I plan on it.」

LABEL: 0x7FE3
STRING: And...

LABEL: 0x8040
STRING: With an awkward look on his face, Hiragino pulled an infinite number of xylitol tablets out of his pockets.

LABEL: 0x80A6
STRING: Just how many of those was he hoarding...?

LABEL: 0x81AB
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei...」

LABEL: 0x81D8
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x825E
STRING: 「No, never mind.」

LABEL: 0x82E6
STRING: 「Just say it! Sorry that I like these so much!」

LABEL: 0x8321
STRING: I could see Yukari's face twitching subtly.

LABEL: 0x837F
STRING: The tablets weren't the only thing he took out.

LABEL: 0x83E8
STRING: A variety of small medical instruments were lined up.

LABEL: 0x8416
STRING: I had no idea all of there were inside his coat.

LABEL: 0x845C
STRING: He was like an agent from a spy movie.

LABEL: 0x849A
STRING: Reiri then pointed at one of them.

LABEL: 0x84DB
STRING: 「...There.」

LABEL: 0x84FC
STRING: With a small murmur, she pointed at an object.

LABEL: 0x852A
STRING: It was a familiar little apparatus.

LABEL: 0x8556
STRING: It was the thing that had been put on Hikari's and Reiri's fingertips――

LABEL: 0x85F2
STRING: 「An electronic triage tag...」

LABEL: 0x861A
STRING: 「It measures your pulse and blood oxygen levels, and is constantly transmitting that information.」

LABEL: 0x8670
STRING: 「The triage results and transport order immediately reflects the changes in the condition of the injured or sick person.」

LABEL: 0x86D8
STRING: 「It was developed under the assumption that it would be used in large-scale disasters.」

LABEL: 0x8720
STRING: 「Which means it'll continue to transmit its own location data. And it's very durable, of course.」

LABEL: 0x87D1
STRING: 「With this inside, ROMLES won't be able to ignore the Argo float.」

LABEL: 0x881A
STRING: Reiri spoke as if she was certain of our victory.

LABEL: 0x8928
STRING: 「But you said earlier that satellites aren't working――」

LABEL: 0x89CA
STRING: 「The radio bandwidth it uses doesn't utilize satellite communication.」

LABEL: 0x8A0A
STRING: 「Triage tags use the ZigBee standard.」

LABEL: 0x8A48
STRING: 「Its range is about ten kilometers, even without a relay.」

LABEL: 0x8A81
STRING: Ten kilometers... That was more than enough to reach ROMLES and other organizations within Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x8ADD
STRING: All at once, hope was spreading before our eyes.

LABEL: 0x8B0B
STRING: This was it... This was perfect――

LABEL: 0x8B44
STRING: 「The first people to get the triage tag data are DMATs and emergency centers.」

LABEL: 0x8B9C
STRING: 「Reiri-san is right―it will not be ignored.」

LABEL: 0x8BE1
STRING: The light... It connected.
